items.title: Refrigeration Oil Market to Reach USD 2.01 billion by 2032 | SNS Insider
items.author: Sns Insider
items.description: The Refrigeration Oil Market is expected to grow at a CAGR of 4.86% from 2025 to 2032, driven by the increasing use of eco-friendly cooling systems and rising environmental regulations. The U.S. market is the fastest-growing, with a CAGR of 6.25%, due to energy-efficient HVAC retrofits and the introduction of low-GWP synthetic oils.

insights.sentiment_reasoning: Shell plc is mentioned as one of the key players in the Refrigeration Oil market, indicating its involvement and potential growth opportunities in this market.

Honeywell International Inc. is mentioned as one of the key players in the Refrigeration Oil market and has introduced low-GWP synthetic oils to meet the increasingly stringent EPA regulations and growing healthcare sector refrigeration demand, indicating its technological advancements and growth potential in this market.
Merck KGaA is mentioned as one of the key players in the Refrigeration Oil market, indicating its involvement and potential growth opportunities in this market.
